title: Upper Delaware Scenic & Recreational River: Fishing Guides
body: Fishing Guides        Smallmouth Bass Illustration: Duane Raver/USFWS       The following professional fishing guides are currently licensed under Commercial Use Authorizations to operate within the boundaries of Upper Delaware Scenic and Recreational River         Adrian LaSorte Guide Service Adrian LaSorte, Cpt. Scott McClintock 4388 Pioneer Trail Mantua, OH 44255 (330) 732-7057 email: rmcclint@gmail.com  West Branch Angler Resort William 'Wiley' Paul 1540 Pikeland Road Chester Springs, PA 19425 (610) 608-2549 email: wileybpaul@gmail.com  West Branch Angler Resort Kevin Corser Jr. 17066 LaDue Road Holley, NY 14470 (585) 315-2315               Walleye Illustration: Duane Raver/USFWS       All fishing guides or any other commercial businesses charging a fee to provide services on the Upper Delaware River within the authorized boundaries of Upper Delaware Scenic and Recreational River must obtain a Commercial Use Authorization from the National Park Service. Please contact the Chief Ranger's Office for information.
